name: HuGO
tagline: Human Group Onsight - a tool to visualize family constelations
body:
[HuGO project](http://erwin3.github.io/hugo/) -
[HuGO Development](https://github.com/erwin3/hugo) -
[newest alpha](http://erwin3.github.io/hugo/alpha/hugo.html)

### Welcome to the HuGO project.
You find the newest alpha version under
[newst alpha](http://erwin3.github.io/hugo/alpha/hugo.html).

### License
HuGO is published under [GPLv3](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0-standalone.html).

### Local Usage
You can download the tarball or zipfile above, unpack it and open the file src/hugo.html 
with your local browser.

### Usage on your homepage
Since HuGO is developed under GPLv3 you are free to use, change or redistribute it under the terms of this license.

### Authors and Contributors
HuGO is developed by @erwin3 (Henning MÃ¤lzer).
